content: व्यतिक्रमः {@--1@} Transgressing, deviating, swerving. {@--2@} Violation, breach, non-performance; as in सांविद्व्यतिक्रमः; प्रतिबघ्नाति हि श्रेयः पूज्यपूजाव्यतिक्रमः <ls>R. 1. 79.</ls> {@--3@} Disregard, neglect, omission. {@--4@} Contrariety, inversion, reverse. {@--5@} Sin, vice, crime. {@--6@} Adversity, misfortune.
